kodi-rubber-base-acid-free-15ml.title: Acid-Free Rubber Base, 15 ml
description: Transparent base coat Rubber Base Acid Free (15 ml).
Medium viscosity; spreads easily with a brush, does not run; self-leveling.
Provides 14–21 days of wear (depending on nail condition).
Medium rigidity; not recommended for thin and brittle nails.
Acid-free formula with a pH equal to water.
Recommendations: use Ultrabond before application; removal is mechanical.
